overview: Celebrate 100 magical years of Disney with this collectible compilation of animated shorts! Mickey and his friends embark on 10 hilarious, madcap adventures that include Mr. Duck Steps Out, Winter Storage, Pluto's Party, Pluto and the Gopher, Mickey's Trailer, Pluto's Sweater, Boat Builders, Tugboat Mickey, The Band Concert and Lonesome Ghosts.
title: Mickey & Friends: 10 Classic Shorts (Volume 2)
